Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Chemlab^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Nicely done. Now you'll need to find some space for this in your own base.

^green;Fertilizer, liquids, explosive components^reset; and ^green;particles^reset;  are all potential creations of the  ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset;. It will develop into a far more advanced lab over time. Build one now to explore this science.
